title: Black screen after Champ Select
body:
This happened after he 7.1 Patch update. When champ select ends, the screen goes completely black. I still enter game, but the screen just remains black. Any suggestions?
I've already deleted and redownloaded w no effect.{{champion:32}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Same Problem 
nothing works please help

Black screens in champ select is usually the result of a failure to establish a stable connection to the servers. 

Champ Select in all modes requires a more steady connection than the lobby as picks (and bans for Draft) are processed in real-time. This is why it's more vulnerable to disconnect there. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

Same thing for me as soon as I updated.  Ive tried many things as a solution without any luck.  

Just to clarify the screen goes black as if I have turned off the PC meanwhile everything is still running as you can hear the sounds.  I was even typing to teammates saying sorry.   Hope a fix is released ASAP!
Yup, we're in the same boat... Just tried again but no luck.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Do IT support cares. :) What a game!
